doc:
Neil Giuntoli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neil_Giuntoli 0 Neil Giuntoli (born 1959) is an American actor active since 1987, whose most famous role was in Child's Play (1988). Giuntoli is also the author and lead actor of the play Hizzoner, a fictional account of former Chicago mayor Richard J. Daley. The play received the longest run ever granted to a production at Chicago's Prop Theater and was critically well received. Neil_Giuntoli ( born 1959 ) is an_American_actor active since 1987 , whose_most_famous_role was in Child 's_Play ( 1988 ) . Giuntoli is also the_author and lead actor of the_play_Hizzoner , a_fictional_account of former_Chicago_mayor_Richard_J._Daley . The_play received the_longest_run ever_granted to a_production at Chicago 's_Prop_Theater and was_critically_well_received .
